talk.author: did:plc:rscouhvor22ngh47mkt7e5qk
talk.utter:
I have a pitbull. He happens to be the sweetest, gentlest dog I've ever known.

He is also very playful and thinks kids are other dogs who want to play with him.

For this reason, he is never off the leash unless we are in the fenced-in dog park. And if a child comes into the park, he gets leashed.

talk.author: did:plc:vs6wskuj25efxaut5bvv5jkv
talk.utter: i have a pittie too...there's no point taking him off leash he won't leave my side...he loves kids & other dogs it's the other dogs i have to watch out for...he's obsessed w/tiny dogs even though they often bite him...he grew up around my friends kids & he's so into kids & is a giant cuddle bug

talk.author: did:plc:rscouhvor22ngh47mkt7e5qk
talk.utter: Mine is a big, lovable goof who looks like a potato when he sleeps.
